title: Trade Table
description: Defines a trade table with tiers of trades for villagers or other trading entities.

tokens.text: defines a set of tiered trades available from villagers or trading entities

fields.title: Tiers
fields.description: Array of trade tiers. Each tier unlocks as the villager gains experience. Novice (tier 1) is always available.

fields.title: Weight
fields.description: The weight/probability of this trade being selected. This property was deprecated and removed in newer versions.
fields.note: The weight property was available in versions 1.16 through 1.18 but has been removed.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this trade table. This property was used in older versions.
fields.note: Trade tables no longer require a format_version field in newer versions.

fields.title: Filter Group
fields.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.
